Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 64th overall pick, by Los Angeles (A) in 2012...
Injured on 6/23/2012 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/5/2013, off Gavin Floyd (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/2015, off Sergio Romo (COL)...
Injured on 7/8/2015 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 6-7 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 6/30/2017 (Going to LAA: SS J. Profar. Going to PIT: SS R. Gotay, 3B K. Cowart, CF E. Marzilli, 2B R. Cano, RF I. Boone Jr.)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis on 6/9/2019...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 7/30/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/9/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,100 per year...
